snippet: The president asked the Senate to confirm Sharon Block and Richard Griffin to the N.L.R.B. after their nominations were rejected by an appeals court.
abstract: Pres Obama asks Senate to confirm Democrats Sharon Block and Richard Griffin to the National Labor Relations Board after their recess appointments were rejected by a federal appeals court.
lead_paragraph: The president asked the Senate to confirm Sharon Block and Richard Griffin to the N.L.R.B. after their nominations were rejected by an appeals court.

headline.seo: Obama Renominates N.L.R.B. Appointments That Were Ruled Unconstitutional
headline.main: Obama Resubmits Appointees for Labor Board
